text: James Henry Molyneaux, Baron Molyneaux of Killead, KBE, PC (27 August 1920 – 9 March 2015) was a Northern Irish Unionist politician. He was leader of the Ulster Unionist Party from 1979 to 1995. He was a leading member and sometime Vice-President of the Conservative Monday Club. An Orangeman,http://www.sneps.net/OO/photos.htm Eric Kaufmann's Orange Order Page – Photos, retrieved 19 November 2007. he was also Sovereign Grand Master of the Royal Black Institution from 1971 to 1995. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2015 deaths Category:British military personnel of World War II Category:Leaders of political parties in the United Kingdom Category:Conservative Life Peers Category:Members of the Privy Council of the United Kingdom Category:UK MPs 1970–1974 Category:UK MPs 1974 Category:UK MPs 1974–1979 Category:UK MPs 1979–1983 Category:UK MPs 1983–1987 Category:UK MPs 1987–1992 Category:UK MPs 1992–1997 Category:Ulster Unionist Party MPs
title: James Molyneaux, Baron Molyneaux of Killead
